document.full_text: ivory coast has launched a criminal probe against former president laurent gbagbo, his wife simone and 100 other close associates over alleged human rights abuses, a government spokesman said on wednesday.
document.title: ivory coast opens gbagbo probe on rights abuses
lines_and_colors: ivory coast has launched a criminal probe against former president laurent gbagbo, his wife simone and 100 other close associates over alleged human rights abuses, a government spokesman said on wednesday.
